text: 2:12 2 Atriviba 13:14Ezɨ Elisa Elaijan gari a zuima a kamaghɨn dɨa mɨgɨavɨra iti, “Nan afeziam! Nan afeziam! Nɨ Israelian akurvazir gumazir bar gavgavim, mati mɨdorozir hoziaba ko mɨdorozir karisba.” Ezɨ Elaija ghugha gɨvazɨ, Elisa uam an gari puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Elisa bar oseme, egha uan korotiar ruarimɨn suiragha anebɨghizɨ, an akuar pumuningɨn irɨ, kar a uan osɨmtɨzim akakagha amizir arazim.
